1.title: Northumberland

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: The father and son duo explore a section of Hadrian's Wall, visit a family run smokehouse to discover how kippers are prepared, stay in a haunted castle and learn about a dog breed.

2.title: Isles of Scilly

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The pair load their bikes onto the Paddington-Penzance sleeper train, take a ferry across the Celtic sea and head to the Isles of Scilly where they help deliver the mail and witness the World Gig Rowing Championships.

3.title: The Peak District

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: The Lambs challenge each other to a race through Britain's first National Park, join the World Hen Racing Championships, witness an ancient ceremony and indulge in some springtime sheep-washing.

4.title: Wales

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: The Lambs set off to conquer Snowdon, George puts a Llama display team through their paces, they try one of the longest zip wires in the world.

5.title: Northern Ireland

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: The Lambs spot seals around Stangford Lough, enjoy Guinness and oysters, research their family history and play the bodhran at Northern Ireland's oldest thatched roofed pub.

6.title: Outer Hebrides

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: The Lambs tackle the Hebridean Cycle Way, meet a weaver of Harris Tweed, have a kick-about on one of the world's most spectacular football pitches and learn to play the bagpipes.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Larry and George explore the beautiful Yorkshire Dales by bicycle, helping train a young sheepdog, making pork pies and rock-climbing. They meet actor Duncan Preston in a local pub for ferret racing.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Larry and George commence their visit to the Highlands of Scotland with a speedboat tour of Loch Lomond before cycling into the Trossachs National Park and competing in a race against a boat.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: There's more father- and- son matey banter as Larry and George weave their way along the Pembrokeshire coast. The pair head out with a local fisherman, enjoy a spot of frisbee golf and reflect on the trip in a microbrewery.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: The duo cycle through the New Forest National Park where they meet the famous ponies, set up a bush-craft camp, attend a chair-building class and canoe down the Beaulieu River.

imdb.plot outline: Larry and George Lamb embark on a mesmerising 4 part journey across Britain, absorbing the scenery and local culture as they pedal their way through four of the beautiful National Parks. The pair's magical father-son chemistry makes for fantastic viewing and alongside the beautiful countryside settings, the show succeeds in making us fall in love with Britain all over again.
imdb.title: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb
akas: Britain by Bike with Larry & George Lamb (United Kingdom)
plot: The father and son duo take to two wheels to explore Britain's National Parks from the saddle.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>

Larry and George Lamb embark on a mesmerising 4 part journey across Britain, absorbing the scenery and local culture as they pedal their way through four of the beautiful National Parks. The pair's magical father-son chemistry makes for fantastic viewing and alongside the beautiful countryside settings, the show succeeds in making us fall in love with Britain all over again.::deano-dan
